systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

location.Description: Location where the resource is stored

etag.Description: Entity tag is used for comparing two or more entities from the same requested resource.

tags.Description: A list of key value pairs that describe the resource.

displayName.Description: display name of the standard, equivalent to the standardId

standardType.Description: standard type (Custom or BuiltIn only currently)

components.Description: List of component objects containing component unique keys (such as assessment keys) to apply to standard scope.  Currently only supports assessment keys.

supportedClouds.Description: List of all standard supported clouds.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

systemData.Description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

location.Description: Location where the resource is stored

etag.Description: Entity tag is used for comparing two or more entities from the same requested resource.

tags.Description: A list of key value pairs that describe the resource.

assignedStandard.Description: Standard item with key as applied to this standard assignment over the given scope

assignedComponent.Description: Component item with key as applied to this standard assignment over the given scope

scope.Description: Scope to which the standardAssignment applies - can be a subscription path or a resource group under that subscription

expiresOn.Description: Expiration date of this assignment as a full ISO date

metadata.Description: The assignment metadata. Metadata is an open ended object and is typically a collection of key value pairs.

id.Description: full resourceId of the Microsoft.Security/standard object

key.Description: unique key to a security assessment object
